There have been many astonishing moments in World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) and quite a few bemusing stories, like this one - Big Show going all diarrhea over Brock Lesnar.

WWE.Com

Yes, you read that right, it actually happened. The beast that Brock Lesnar is, he is an absolute carnage inside the ring and many fear his presence.

He has made a name for himself over they years and is one of the most dominating fighters in history.

He has over been involved in many fierce battles in his career and has been a top draw wherever he goes and performs.

The Beast Incarnate took part in a rare Q&A in front of nearly 1,000 patrons at the the Prince of Wales Centre, and shared the story of how the World's Largest Athlete ended up shitting on him back in the day.

While taking on the giant Big Show in a live event in South Africa, who was suffering from food poisoning before the match, a very weird turn of events took place.

He persisted with performing but it ended up going badly wrong as Show exploded with diarrhea all over Lesnar when he was slammed to the canvas.

Lesnar told the amusing/disgusting story of how, one night during a show in South Africa, The Big Show had food poisoning. Lesnar slammed him to the canvas and his opponent exploded with diarrhoea all over him.

That is quite a hilarious tale and what a sight it would have been - not great if you ask me.
